thread.title: Rihanna dancing with her flask is the realest thing at the Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: Rihanna dancing with her flask is the realest thing at the Grammy Awards

author: USA TODAY
title: Rihanna dancing with her flask is the realest thing at the Grammy Awards
text:
Rihanna dancing with her flask is the realest thing at the Grammy Awards Sara M Moniuszko , USA TODAY 11:59 p.m. ET Feb. 12, 2017 
Singer Rihanna during The 59th GRAMMY Awards at STAPLES Center on February 12, 2017. (Photo: Christopher Polk, Getty Images for NARAS) 
Bad girl RiRi was having a good time at the Grammy Awards on Sunday -- thanks in part to her flask. 
The Work singer was seen taking a few swigs from a bedazzled flask throughout the show, and whether she was coping with her lack of Grammy wins or just having a good time, we were here for her unapologetic realness. 
And Twitter was here for it too. Rihanna drinking out of her diamond encrusted flask & passing it around is my mood pic.twitter.com/l54WGvjjqg
